          <title>
            <string language="en">Heat conduction in handlebars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitzeübertragung in den Lenkstangen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conduction de la chaleur dans des guidons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Condução do calor nos handlebars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conduzione di calore in manubri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διεξαγωγή θερμότητας handlebars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conducción del calor en manillares</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration is a series of drawings showing an activity to demonstrate differences in heat conduction for a metal handlebar and a plastic saddle.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">insulator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat conduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal bars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plastics</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung ist eine Reihe Zeichnungen, die 
eine Aktivität zeigen, um Unterschiede bezüglich der 
Hitzeübertragung für eine Metalllenkstange und einen Plastiksattel 
zu demonstrieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration est une série de schémas 
montrant une activité pour démontrer des différences dans la 
conduction de la chaleur pour un guidon en métal et une selle en 
plastique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração é uma série dos desenhos que 
mostram uma atividade para demonstrar diferenças na condução do 
calor para um handlebar do metal e uma sela plástica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione è una serie di illustrazioni
che mostrano un'attività per dimostrare le differenze nella 
conduzione di calore per un manubrio del metallo e una sella di 
plastica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση είναι μια σειρά σχεδίων που 
εμφανίζουν μια δραστηριότητα για να καταδείξει τις διαφορές στη 
διεξαγωγή θερμότητας για handlebar μετάλλων και μια πλαστική 
σέλα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración es una serie de gráficos que 
muestran una actividad para demostrar diferencias en la conducción 
del calor para un manillar del metal y una montura plástica.</string>
          </description>
